data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3530574,"name":"","username":"Carnotaurus","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/carnotaurus/{size}/250033_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-17T20:38:58.289Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe’re seeing a weird issue for the first time. All of our swerves are present and able to be blinked from Phoenix Tuner X, but when we go into phoenix to move the motors the steer motors (Falcons) work but three drive motors (Krakens) not moving and the lights are staying solid orange and say they don’t get a signal. The one swerve module with a drive motor that works is the first on our \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCAN\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Controller Area Network\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e loop but since phoenix works it shouldn’t be \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCAN\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Controller Area Network\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e. Same issues when we push our code if that matters. Also, it shouldn’t be mechanically broken because 2 of them were taken from our practice bot and there were no issues with those swerve modules until now. Edit: I should probably say that we used smart dashboard and checked when we run from our code it was sending values as well. All the values being sent were reasonable and
